Room.Name: Orange Jacinith Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a magnificant hallway composed completely of crystal jacinith continuing to the north and east. There is a mirror directly to the west which forces the passage to turn towards the north.
Room.LongDescription: The mirror is oddly placed at a 45 degree angle to the two hallways. In the mirror, you can see yourself walking towards yourself in a very wierd optical illusion. Or is it an illusion? As you look into the mirror to the west, you see a seemingly endless hallway. Turning to the east, you can still see the magnificent crystal intersection.
